name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 10, Peking University professor Li Ling said in an interview with Phoenix Finance that the biggest difficulty in medical reform is to change the government. This is a huge redistribution of benefits, and no one dares to touch this high-voltage line. When we were making the medical reform plan, 800 billion yuan was enough to achieve free medical care for all. Now it is 9 trillion yuan, and you haven't even touched the hair. Too many people have received money that they don't deserve.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Peking University Li Ling's "China's Major Medical Issues" full version

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 11, Foshan, Guangdong. China Construction Third Engineering Bureau owed workers wages. The workers went to the Labor Bureau for arbitration, but were told by the staff that they would not accept the case. The staff said, "We are dealing with disputes between enterprises and employees. If there are contractors among you, and the contractors invited you to come, don't waste time going through the arbitration process."
